title: Drawing, "Sketches from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia:  Leaf Boughs, Vine Stems,  Guacamaya Tree Top, Bush and Tree Group, White Bird , and a Plant Detail", 1853, probably May
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white on gray paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: Guacamaya / feathery; at upper center:  vine stems; again, at center right:  White birds on / the Magdalena
description: Horizontal view of leaf boughs, vine stems and top of a Guacamaya tree across upper part of sheet with a group of bushes and trees, a white bird and a plant detain across the bottom part.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia:  Leaf Boughs, Vine Stems,  Guacamaya Tree Top, Bush and Tree Group, White Bird , and a Plant Detail", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite, brush and oxidized white on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-846-b.
